#summary The Item Selector Custom URL eXtension is a SDL Tridion 2011 Custom URL, which allows you to select an item URI from a SDL Tridion tree view.

= Introduction =

This extension is released on SDL Tridion World, a full description can be found on [http://sdltridionworld.com/community/2011_extensions/itemselector.aspx]

= Version =

This eXtension is developed and tested on SDL Tridion 2011 (including HR1)
